remarks.format: ## Remarks 基实现呈现``用给定的特性的标记。The base implementation renders a `` tag with the given attributes. 继承适配器可以重写此方法并调用基实现之前修改的属性的字典。Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes before calling the base implementation. 此 API 已过时。This API is obsolete. 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两次调用此方法。This method is called twice. 在首次调用，该编写器参数是`null`，并且该方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示是否有额外``要写入的元素。On the first call, the writer parameter is `null`, and the method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether or not it has additional `` elements to write. 在第二个调用时，该方法通过使用提供的编写器写入内容。On the second call, the method writes the content by using the provided writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将写入到输出流的链接。This method writes a link to the output stream. 链接将显示在分页窗体中为用户启用窗体的页面间进行导航。The link appears on paginated forms to enable to the user to navigate between a form's pages.
